comments.author: angela
comments.body:
if you want to do that, fine by me.
just let me commit a couple of changes before in order to avoid conflicts.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Angela, any pending changes in spi-commons?

comments.author: angela
comments.body: i don't have anything pending in any of the spi-projects (or only insignificant ones).

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: OK, thanks. I will proceed with the proposed restructuring tonight.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Packages moved in revision 605147.

The dependent packages in trunk were also updated, and I'll still take a look at the spi components in sandbox.

description: To avoid confusion and naming conflicts, we should put all classes and packages in jackrabbit-spi-commons under org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.
summary: Put everything in jackrabbit-spi-commons under org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons
